thread.section_title: Parkway Cars Perton Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parkway Cars Perton | parkwaycarsperton.co.uk
thread.title: Barbara Cullinan
thread.title_full: Parkway Cars Perton reviewed by Barbara Cullinan

author: Barbara Cullinan
title: Barbara Cullinan
text: I have booked various journeys of varying distances with Parkway cars. Drivers are constantly friendly yet professional. Cars are always clean inside and out. Nothing is too much trouble. Consistently punctual and if there is a problem they keep you up to date at all times.
